activities.name: Script2
activities.description:
with raw_data as (
SELECT 
    cast(ContentId as int) as content_id
    , ContentName as content_name
    , cast(cast(DateSubmitted -2e as datetime) as date) as date
    , cast(DateSubmitted -2e as datetime) as timestamp
    , cast(Votes as int) as votes
    , Name as name
    , Email as email
  FROM Temp_Raw_Umbraco_LikesReport
)

MERGE INTO Raw_Umbraco_LikesReport a
USING raw_data b
    ON a.content_id = b.content_id
    and a.timestamp = b.timestamp 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.votes = b.votes
            , a.content_name = b.content_name
            , a.email = b.email

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (content_id, content_name,date,timestamp,votes,name,email)
  VALUES (
    b.content_id
    , b.content_name
    , b.date
    , b.timestamp
    , b.votes
    , b.name
    , b.email
        );

scripts.text:
with raw_data as (
SELECT 
    cast(ContentId as int) as content_id
    , ContentName as content_name
    , cast(cast(DateSubmitted -2e as datetime) as date) as date
    , cast(DateSubmitted -2e as datetime) as timestamp
    , cast(Votes as int) as votes
    , Name as name
    , Email as email
  FROM Temp_Raw_Umbraco_LikesReport
)

MERGE INTO Raw_Umbraco_LikesReport a
USING raw_data b
    ON a.content_id = b.content_id
    and a.timestamp = b.timestamp 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.votes = b.votes
            , a.content_name = b.content_name
            , a.email = b.email

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (content_id, content_name,date,timestamp,votes,name,email)
  VALUES (
    b.content_id
    , b.content_name
    , b.date
    , b.timestamp
    , b.votes
    , b.name
    , b.email
        );

with raw_data as (
    SELECT 
        timestamp as date
        , sum(votes) as votes
    FROM Raw_Umbraco_LikesReport
    group by timestamp
)
--select * from raw_data
MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING raw_data b
        ON a.channel = 'Website' 
        and a.sub_channel = 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
        and a.date = b.date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET a.likes_consid_engage = b.votes
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel,sub_channel,content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, likes_consid_engage)
  VALUES (
        'Website'
        , 'Digital Changemakers Hub'
        , null
        , b.date
        , datename(month, b.date)
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date))
        , concat(datename(month, b.date), ' ', year(b.date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, b.date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(b.date, -1)))) + 1)
        , datename(dw, b.date)
        , case when datename(dw, b.date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end
        , case 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '05:00:00' and '08:59:59' then 'Morning Commute' 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '09:00:00' and '11:59:59' then 'Mid Morning' 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '12:00:00' and '15:59:59' then 'Afternoon' 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '16:00:00' and '18:59:59' then 'Morning Commute' 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '19:00:00' and '23:59:59' then 'Late Evening' 
            when cast(b.date as time) between '00:00:00' and '04:59:59' then 'Night' 
          end
        , b.votes
        );
